hero.title: Frontend Developer
hero.description: I am a full-stack developer with solid React frontend development skills and rich project experience. Graduated from the University of Auckland, I worked as a software development intern and have the ability to build modern and efficient web applications.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Frontend Developer
about.p1: I am Guo Shengyuan, a frontend developer currently pursuing a Master's degree in Information Technology at the University of Auckland. I have a solid educational background in computer science and practical software development experience.
about.p2: In my career, I have focused on the React ecosystem, developing various responsive web applications. I am familiar with modern frontend development tools and technologies, including React, Redux, Tailwind CSS, etc. I also have full-stack development capabilities, understanding backend technologies such as Node.js and Express.
about.p3: I am passionate about technology, especially in the fields of frontend development and artificial intelligence. Currently, I am looking for a frontend development position that can utilize my technical expertise, while constantly learning and growing.
about.techstack.desc: Proficient in React, JavaScript/TypeScript and various frontend frameworks
about.education.desc: Master of Information Technology & Bachelor of Computer Science from University of Auckland
about.projects.desc: Developed multiple React-based web applications, including Musichat streaming website

job1.desc1: As a core team member, primarily responsible for the frontend development of a React-based pharmacy management system, using React + Redux to develop real-time order systems and medicine management features.
job1.desc2: Implemented data visualization using ECharts to assist management in decision analysis.
job1.desc3: Developed a real-time order notification system based on SSE (Server-Sent Events), integrated with Redux for state management.
job1.desc4: Created a pharmacy map system using Leaflet API, enabling multi-store inventory visualization and real-time monitoring, significantly improving staff efficiency.
job1.desc5: Built responsive UI interfaces using Ant Design and Tailwind CSS, and implemented JWT user authentication to ensure system security.
job1.desc6: Participated in backend API development and data collection, using Python scraping to collect and process 9000+ medicine data, providing foundational data support for image recognition.

job2.desc1: Project maintenance: Used Vite to set up initial project builds and packaging, configured CI/CD for the project.
job2.desc2: Frontend: Used React Native to recreate interfaces based on prototypes, called APIs using Axios, applied Tailwind CSS for styling and layout, and used Redux for state management.
job2.desc3: Implemented performance optimizations using throttling, debouncing, lazy loading, and various React hooks. Integrated OpenAI API for personalized recommendations.
job2.desc4: Implemented real-time online chat functionality using socket.io.
job2.desc5: Backend: Used Express framework with MongoDB database.

education.title: Education Background
education.desc1: Currently pursuing a Master's degree in Information Technology at the University of Auckland, focusing on advanced software development and web application development technologies.
education.desc2: Completed a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science at the University of Auckland, studying fundamental theories and practical skills in computer science.
education.achievement1: Musichat project won the Best Student Project Award at the University of Auckland in 2024
education.achievement2: The MediMate system I contributed to was recognized in the Medical Health Technology Innovation Competition

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.subtitle: Have a question or want to work together? Feel free to get in touch!

form.name: Name
form.success: Thank you for your message! I will get back to you as soon as possible.
